code: var baseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;var fetchSinToken=function fetchSinToken(endpoint,data){var method=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'GET';var url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(endpoint);if(method==='GET'){return fetch(url);}else{return fetch(url,{method:method,headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});}};var fetchConToken=function fetchConToken(endpoint,data){var method=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'GET';var url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(endpoint);var token=localStorage.getItem('token')||'';if(method==='GET'){return fetch(url,{method:method,headers:{'x-token':token}});}else{return fetch(url,{method:method,headers:{'Content-type':'application/json','x-token':token},body:JSON.stringify(data)});}};export{fetchSinToken,fetchConToken};
